arts.ttl: Bristol City player ratings vs Oxford United as nine-man Robins secure battling away point
arts.sum: Having done so well to keep things level until the second half, the Bristol City stopper just appeared to watch as Gregory Leigh's shot dribbled into the bottom corner. Headed plenty clear in the second half and was constantly involved when the Reds needed him.

arts.ttl: Bristol City hit back to take a point at Oxford
arts.sum: The Robins ended with two players sent off.

arts.ttl: UPDATES: Oxford United v Bristol City – live
arts.sum: All the build-up, action and reaction as Oxford United welcome former head coach Liam Manning and his Bristol City side. The U’s are unbeaten in their first eight league matches under Gary Rowett. Oxford United (16th) v Bristol City (8th) Comment below or tweet @OxfordMailOUFC to get involved.

arts.ttl: Bristol City predicted team vs Oxford United as Robins search for first away win since November
arts.sum: With Josh Campbell-Slowey still sidelined and Cam Pring a few weeks away from match fitness, the only alternative would be to play one of George Tanner, Ross McCrorie or Haydon Roberts out of position. Liam Manning's Reds are looking to end a seven-match winless run away from Ashton Gate, with their last win on the road coming against Norwich City in November.

arts.ttl: What Bristol City can expect from Rowett's Oxford United who look 'at home in the Championship'
arts.sum: Form then tailed off in November, and United endured just one win in 15 matches prior to Buckingham being dismissed but since Gary Rowett came in, the U’s are unbeaten in eight league games and now look much more at home in the Championship. Having got back to winning ways against Blackburn Rovers last weekend, Bristol City and Liam Manning's focus now turns to Saturday's clash with Oxford United.

arts.ttl: Bristol City confirm Ephraim Yeboah exit as forward completes loan move to Scottish Championship
arts.sum: Bristol City have confirmed that Ephraim Yeboah has departed Ashton Gate on loan for the remainder of the season, with the young forward joining Dunfermline on a temporary basis. Bristol City Live is now on WhatsApp and we want you to join our community.

arts.ttl: Cam Pring, Marcus McGuane, Josh Campbell-Slowey: Bristol City team news ahead of Oxford clash
arts.sum: Liam Manning has confirmed Marcus McGuane is in contention to feature for Bristol City in their clash with Oxford United but admits Cam Pring is still a couple of weeks away from returning from injury. The 19-year-old has been in and around the first-team squad this season while also playing for City's Under-21s and while Manning feels he is ready to step in if required in defence, he is also still in the process of recovering from an injury.

arts.ttl: Liam Manning sheds light on Yu Hirakawa's Bristol City future ahead of Oxford United clash
arts.sum: Hirakawa was the Reds' second signing of the summer transfer window, making the move to Ashton Gate on a season-long loan from Machida Zelvia with a view to signing a permanent contract in the West Country. Liam Manning has shed some light on Yu Hirakawa's future at Bristol City admitting it would not make sense for the Robins to sign him on loan without seeing a permanent deal through.

arts.ttl: Dane Scarlett scores first Spurs goal to spark progression in Europa League
arts.sum: DANE Scarlett scored his first goal for Tottenham Hotspur as his header sparked a 3-0 win in the Europa League at home against Elfsborg.

arts.ttl: Tottenham 3-0 Elfsborg: Academy trio Dane Scarlett, Damola Ajayi and Mikey Moore score their first Spurs goals to secure progress in the Europa League
arts.sum: MATT BARLOW AT THE TOTTENHAM HOTSPUR STADIUM: The breakthrough came from Dane Scarlett, who spent the first half of the season on loan at Oxford United.
